description: This file defines classes and functions for managing project templates, including template registration, project initialization, and executing pre/post-processing scripts. It includes classes for handling different project types, template generation, and file copying with variable replacements.

classes.name: ProcessingStep
classes.description: Enum for processing steps (Pre-processing and Post-processing).

classes.name: ProjectTemplate
classes.description: Abstract base class for project templates, providing methods for validation, structure generation, testing setup, and processing scripts execution.

classes.name: ProjectTemplateFactory
classes.description: Factory class for creating project template instances based on project type.

classes.name: ProjectInitializer
classes.description: Main class orchestrating project initialization, including template registration, creation, and waiting for post-processing completion.

classes.name: FileSystemHelper
classes.description: Helper class with static methods for copying files and directories with variable replacements, including handling extra files and skipping certain files.

methods.name: ProjectTemplate.get_run_command
methods.description: Returns the command to run the project.

methods.name: ProjectTemplate.get_entry_point_url
methods.description: Returns the entry point URL for the project.

methods.name: ProjectTemplate.initialize
methods.description: Performs project initialization, including validation, pre/post-processing, structure generation, and testing setup.

methods.name: ProjectTemplate.wait_for_post_process_completed
methods.description: Waits for post-processing to complete within a timeout.

methods.name: ProjectTemplate._run_processing_script
methods.description: Runs a processing script in background or synchronously.

methods.name: ProjectTemplateFactory.create_template
methods.description: Creates a project template instance based on project configuration.

methods.name: ProjectInitializer.initialize_project
methods.description: Initializes a project with the specified configuration.

methods.name: FileSystemHelper.copy_template
methods.description: Copies template files with variable replacements, including extra files and hidden files handling.
